short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make virtual school a lot more fun!!!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make virtual school a lot more fun with Virtual School (VS) Lingo Bingo! 

How to play:
ğŸ”¹Open the extension by clicking the VS Lingo Bingo icon in the top right corner (extension must be pinned)
ğŸ”¹When opening the extension for the first time, press "New Bingo Card" to fill the empty boxes. 
ğŸ”¹Click the free space in the centre at any time
ğŸ”¹When someone says or does something on your bingo card, click its square to keep track of it
ğŸ”¹When you get 5 in a row (horizontally, vertically, or diagonally), confetti will appear to celebrate your achievement
ğŸ”¹The card will automatically reset after the confetti celebration

Some other tips:
ğŸ”ºQuotation marks surround the things people may say, while regular prompts are things people may do
ğŸ”ºThe card will automatically save when you close the popup so that you can resume your game the next time you open it
ğŸ”ºYou can always deselect a square if need be 
ğŸ”ºIf you do not like the prompts on your bingo card, you can get a new bingo card at any time by clicking the â€œNew Bingo Cardâ€ button 
ğŸ”ºPay attention in class and have fun! ğŸ˜

Acknowledgements:
- Thank you to my awesome teacher for thinking of the online school bingo idea
- Thank you to everyone who helped come up with bingo prompts
